E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 4/14/1988
Subject: John Verhoeven healing process
John Verhoeven is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Jeff McKnight
Dear Sir,
Jeff McKnight has an AVG of .293 at AA Williamsport Bills!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Francisco Oliveras
Dear Sir,
Francisco Oliveras is doing pretty good at AA Williamsport Bills!
He has an ERA of 2.70, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
